attributes.action: inform us of any issues that have actually been affected by an e-petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the under signed, would like to be told of any situations that have actually been altered, any decisions reversed, or any policies changed by a petition started on this website. We would like to be presented with information that proves that this e-petition website is not just an exercise in spin, but that it actually serves a purpose beyond carthartic out-pourings of opinion.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
